nodes.text: Huttball was a dangerous sport that was popular on Nar Shaddaa during the Old Republic era. The game pitted two randomly selected teams against one another in a no-holds-barred attempt to gain possession of the ball and bring it into the opposing team's camp. Violence and cheating were encouraged in Huttball. Sponsored by the famed Giradda the Hutt, Huttball pitted some of the most powerful heroes in the galaxy in a contest with fame and fortune at stake.
